data.text: @amrakunj Because we did it first doesn't mean we will have been the best. We will be overtaken as other governments look at us for lessons in what to do to avoid 150k dead and rampant transmission amongst the generation of children. #JohnsonVariant
@dasvee @jontutoring @JuttaWeber @jo_ask Bit of something he is, for sure.
@jontutoring @JuttaWeber @amrakunj @jo_ask https://t.co/yQ1N6FVB2c

@amrakunj @jontutoring @jo_ask I will continue a little longer. But totally agree with you. There was s only so much you can take on. And it is entirely pointless to debate if there is no knowledge on one side.

@jontutoring @amrakunj @jo_ask Habe you met him personally?
I have in 2006. He spent two days at a conference.
That has been more than enough for me.
I still can't believe how he Conservative Party made this clown PM. Dangerous. And the UK will pay a very high price for this.
@amrakunj And they're now worrying that the #JohnsonVariant is going to spread because the UK is relaxing controls too fast. 😕
@amrakunj Sheep will sheep.
@JuttaWeber @jontutoring @jo_ask Ok I have blocked Jon, mainly because he couldn’t provide facts to any claims he made. Thank you for the points you made Jutta.

@jontutoring @JuttaWeber @jo_ask Since you haven’t been able to back any claims you have made, I am afraid you have nothing to write on my Twitter feed. Have a good life with the narrative being fed to you. I prefer to find and accept facts.

@jontutoring @amrakunj @jo_ask Every government claiming to be the people's government should make you very afraid.
Go and do some research.
@jontutoring @amrakunj @jo_ask Tell me something positive about the Global Britain which is only possible because of this government?

@jontutoring @jo_ask @amrakunj The small donation happened way before the UK farm devastating FTA with Australia.
It would have been worth looking at the China Switzerland deal which does little favour to Switzerland.
@jontutoring @JuttaWeber @jo_ask Please read up on that trade deal and then read up on the deal U.K. had with its nearest 27 countries.

@jontutoring @amrakunj @jo_ask Give me some evidence. I only get the opposite.
The UK has been my home since 1999. Why should I bash it?
@jontutoring @JuttaWeber @jo_ask Please give me the number of vaccines exported by U.K. to date to the poor countries as you claimed?  Not bashing U.K. at all. Calling out on  lies.
@jontutoring @jo_ask @amrakunj So far the UK has donated a few vaccines to Australia. And returned a few to India which were produced there.

@jontutoring @jo_ask @amrakunj You are not really well informed, are you?
The Biontech and actually all other vaccines have been funded by governments and organisations. Hence tax payers money.
AZ only has reduced price until July 2021.
Temperature of storage has been significantly reduced for other vaccines.
@jontutoring @JuttaWeber @jo_ask Oh I wasn’t aware of any exports  done by U.K., could you please send me data of how many covid vaccines U.K. has exported to poor countries to date?

@amrakunj And they don't have to put up with some testiculating twat telling them how fucking marvellous he is for doing it. Even though he isn't, and in reality he doesn't care whether you live or die.

@amrakunj Exactly - Johnson acts that the vaccine was his gift ! It’s not - it’s his duty. Nearly every country is vaccinating its people  as is expected. We aren’t much ahead but as a result of the Johnson  variant we are in a worse position than the whole of Europe !
@amrakunj 👏👏👏👏

@jontutoring @jo_ask @amrakunj First vaccine approved without emergency measures has been developed by Biontech in Mainz owned by a Turkish couple.
Generally, we are very that scientists worked together globally and developed several working vaccines within months of SarsCov2 appearance.

@jontutoring @amrakunj @jo_ask Grateful to the government? Or the scientists who developed the vaccine? Or the NHS who roll it out? The government have had little to do with protecting you or anyone outside their own circle #JohnsonVariant

@jontutoring @amrakunj The science community are much more collaborative than government will ever be & diverse.Great - if we do save many lives in the developing world. Not governments plan though. I'm grateful to our scientists ...  I do not respect our government.
@jontutoring @amrakunj @jo_ask It’s happening in a lot of countries. Get off your knees
@jontutoring @jo_ask @amrakunj Would safe lives but Britain, unlike other nations, is not sharing...

@jontutoring @amrakunj I'm grateful for my jabs -I just recognise that we're not 'world beating' in this.I wish my 15 & 17 year old could be protected +those I teach. Some double jabbed staff now getting covid due to lack of mitigation- in schools. Wish people were kinder. I'd like to live elsewhere!

@amrakunj And sharing more of their vaccines with poorer nations.
Britain returns to its pirate ways.

@amrakunj Those of us with family living abroad know very well that other countries are doing well & looking after their citizens but now the U.K. govt think our vaccines are superior & insist on Brits abroad visiting family have to isolate. Discrimination !
@amrakunj Actually, lots and lots of us are p*asked off about it, and know the govt are a total wunch of bankers.
